info.title: Controller Tests and the Redirector Action Helper

important.para: The redirect action helper issues an exit() statement when using the method gotoAndExit() and will then obviously also stops a test running for this method. For testability of your application dont use that method on the redirector!

section.para: Due to its nature the redirector action helper plugin issues a redirect and exists after this. Because you cannot test parts of an application that issue exit calls Zend_Test_PHPUnit_ControllerTestCase automatically disables the exit part of the redirector which can cause different behaviours in tests and the real application.
